DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study ( 1 ) provide quantitative information motor manifestation Parkinson 's disease ( 2 ) quantify effect high intensive antigravity locomotor exercise Deep Brain Stimulation implantation Parkinson 's disease .
DOC.brief_title: Motor Performance Parkinson 's Disease After High Intensive Exercise Deep Brain Stimulation
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria ( exercise arm ) : Idiopathic Parkinson 's disease A stable condition last 6 month Hoehn Yahr 2 3 Inclusion Criteria ( Deep Brain Stimulation arm ) : Patients refer Deep Brain Stimulation Cardiovascular disease Conditions contraindicate physical exercise examination
